Thomson bụ onye isi nyocha na onye njikwa ikuku na United States Environmental Protection Agency. Site na 1997 ruo 2017 ọ bụ prọfesọ na Ngalaba nke Sayensị gburugburuebe obibi na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na Mahadum Virginia College of Arts and Sciences
O guzobere ma duzie mmemme Interdisciplinary Environmental Thought and Practice B.A

Onye  gọvanọ Virginia bụ Mark Warner họpụtara n'afọ 2002, Thomson jere ozi dị ka osote onyeisi oche na onye otu State Air Pollution Control Board, otu na-achịkwa mmadụ asaa nke na-eme iwu mmetọ ikuku ma kwado iwu maka Virginia. Gọvanọ Tim Kaine họpụtara ya ọzọ ma jee ozi na Board ruo n'afọ 2010.
N'afọ 2018, akwụkwọ Thomson, Climate of Capitulation, meriri PROSE Award na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na ọchịchị.
